Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.dao.DAO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommentDAO, DevelopmentDAO, IdeaDAO, UserDAO
    @Repository("dAO")
public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A class providing the Hibernate transaction actions.
    Author:
    Shane Lockwood
